name: @jamesjager/react-fundamentals
title: Epic React âš›
description: The material for learning React fundamentals
author: Kent C. Dodds <me@kentcdodds.com> (https://kentcdodds.com/)

scripts.init:reactFundamentals: git clone https://github.com/kentcdodds/react-fundamentals.git && cd react-fundamentals/ && npm run setup --silent
scripts.init:reactHooks: git clone https://github.com/kentcdodds/react-hooks.git && cd react-hooks/ && npm run setup --silent
scripts.init:advancedReactHooks: git clone https://github.com/kentcdodds/advanced-react-hooks.git && cd advanced-react-hooks/ && npm run setup --silent
